name: NINNELT-ELIXIR Model EK 670 C2 Electronic LPG Stationary
description:
Filling Machine for 15 kg & 38 kg cylinders
consisting of:
- Pneumatic self decoupling filling head for 22 mm compact valve
- Aluminium support column
- Electronic loadcell with weighting platform
- ELIXIR keypad display unit and weighting processor
- Gas-stop valve assembly & LPG hose
